### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#23418](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/23418) (Fix signed integer overflow in prioritisetransaction RPC by Marco
9947ce62626c05bd186ae8a4864aa382f673ec1a\n\nNote that `parent` can be non-const. Maybe `GetMemPoolParentsConst` should return `std::set<const CTxMemPoolEntryRef, CompareIteratorByHash>` instead.
